column4: you can also put the live cd in a running old er and it should do a upgrade
not sure about that
psusi: rescue is "single"
yes but in runlevel 1 you boot into a root bash
are you sure init 1 won't prompt for the root password?
nope it invokes single user
single /does/ ask for the root password if it is set
never did me
because you don't have a root password set
? i did on a osx box i broke into
don't know about osx, just ubuntu
im gonna init 1m netbook just to see
droped right to root shell
is a root password set?
no password
yea i got a su pass
k, good to know
i had to invoke single not init 1
probly a grub 2 thing
brings up a curses menu with drop to root shell as a option
right, if you have a root password set you won't be able to drop to a root shell without knowing.  This was dax2112rush's issue
well we all have passwords
and it droped no password
oboma still nucking helthcare
